attributes.action: Russia's membership of the WTO should be suspended
attributes.additional_details:
It has become increasingly clear over recent days that the Russian government is incapable of acting acceptably towards other states. It would seem inappropriate therefore to have them as members of organisations when the members are expected to maintain a certain standard of behaviour.

The government should do everything in their power to encourage the suspension of Russia's membership of the World Trade Organisation until such time that Russia removes any military personnel from Ukrainian soil.
